item.title: Code Style
item.description: ⚠️ This is a work-in-progress. #ifndef LODESTAR_CONTAINER_HPP #define LODESTAR_CONTAINER_HPP #include <array> // Note that we do not use `using std` to limit namespace pollution/clashes // Preprocessor directives and their arguments should be in upper snake case #define STATIC_GET(ARRAY, IDX) std::get<IDX>(ARRAY) // Template arguments should be descriptive, written in upper camel case, and prefixed with T* template <typename TType> // Constexpr should be prefixed with K*, and the following word should be in lower camel case.
